   By Louis Jacobson November 29, 2011

DNC ad accuses Mitt Romney of flip-flopping on assault-weapons ban

   On Nov. 28, 2011, the Democratic National Committee released two videos
   designed to paint Republican presidential candidate and former
   Massachusetts Gov.

Screen text: Against assault weapons ban

   Video clip of Romney speaking: "I do not support any new legislation of an
   assault weapon ban nature."

The difficulty of analyzing this charge is that Romney's position on an
   assault-weapons ban in the 2008 debate was so muddled that it's hard to
   pin down whether he actually flip-flopped.
